choices.text:
when I was 6, my sister was half my age. Now I am 80. How old is my sister now? Calculate this step by step.
Let's start with the given information: "When I was 6, my sister was half my age." This means that your sister was 3 years old at that time (since you were 6 and she was half of it). Now we need to find out how much older than 80 you are now. You said in a previous message that you're currently 80, so let's use this information as the starting point:
When I am 80 years old, my sister is ___ years old (since she was half of me when I was 6).
